miniapp.name: Base Galaga
miniapp.subtitle: Galaga-style Shooter MiniApp
miniapp.description: A classic Galaga-style shooter game built with Base MiniApp SDK. Battle enemies, score points, and share your achievements on Farcaster!
miniapp.tagline: Classic arcade shooting action on Base
miniapp.ogDescription: Play the classic Galaga-style shooter game on Base MiniApp
